:::: {.about-body}

I am a postoctoral researcher working on the formulation of hybrid thermodynamic models that combine **_physical knowledge_** with new methods from **_machine learning (ML)_**. 
THe main focus hereby is are new fundamental equations of state (EOS) and transport property models for pure fluids and mixtures.
As important part of this work, I'm engaged in the developement of thermodynamic open source libraries in the Julia language -- including the new machine learning models (see Projects).

## {{< iconify octicon:star-24 >}} Interests {.interests}

- Thermodynamics
- Machine Learning
- Julia Language
- Equations of State (EOS)
- Transport Properties
- Molecular Simulations
